text: Harstad () is the second-most populated municipality in Troms county, Norway. (From 2024, it will be part of Troms county.) It is on the large island of Hinn√∏ya. The town was founded in 1904. The bicycle race, Arctic Race of Norway (summer 2025), will start in Harstad.https://www.nrk.no/tromsogfinnmark/her- skal-arctic-race-of-norway-vaere-i-2025-1.17102578.
